sources.title: The Wayward Hat (1960)
sources.description: When Foofle accidentally peels his own hat instead of an apple, he goes down to the store to buy a new hat. Unfortunately for him, his new hat blows away and now has to go to great lengths to get it back. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-wayward-hat-1960/

metadata.Plot: When Foofle accidentally peels his own hat instead of an apple, he goes down to the store to buy a new hat. Unfortunately for him, his new hat blows away and now has to go to great lengths to get it back.
